solution_line_template: Three weeks at {days_per_week_weekdays} days per week means Damien runs {num_weeks}*{days_per_week_weekdays}=<<{num_weeks}*{days_per_week_weekdays}={total_running_days}>>{total_running_days} times in three weeks.

If each time he runs {miles_per_day} miles, then over {total_running_days} running days he covers {miles_per_day}*{total_running_days}=<<{miles_per_day}*{total_running_days}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles.
